column5: Not sure if this has been posted yet but here is a really cool read from ESPN  on as they put it "Flat-out mean and ugly: 10 scariest fish on planet"    http://sports.espn.go.com/outdoors/tv/colu...est_fish_Part_I    Cheers
If you're a man who's standing in the middle of the Amazon river and needs to take a whizzz, I'd fear the Candiru more than any piranha or stingray in the river.  Google it and find out why
I found out why.  Wish I never had......It's got my vote.  Check here if you dare....Candiru
Dont look........You wont like what you see....  OUCH!!!!!
The same thing happened to me only in my case it was a sand shark....ok so I'm bragging
That Alligator Gar was a funny story.
OUCH !!! That Candiru fish is nasty.
YIPES!!! That nasty candiru.  I will never pee in lakes or rivers again, just swimming pools.
Great read!  Thanks for posting the link...very interesting....wouldn't want to meet up with most of those monsters!
don't agree with some of them, here's why  http://deepseanews.blogspot.com/2006/03/sp...-fish-from.html  http://images.google.ca/imgres?imgurl=http...=image&cd=2
Those are nothin'  Ive got a goldfish that will take your finger off if you dont watch it!
